web.gui.secretary

Class MainPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • web.gui.secretary.MainPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class MainPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    the main framework (a JPanel) for the whole web application. Contains 2 parts: menu JPanel and content JPanel.
  • menu part: fixed except that it isn't appeared along with LoginPanel.
  • content part: changeable when an action is called.
Author:
maint
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • MainPanel

        public MainPanel()
        constructor to initialize components, create the first page of web app which is the "Log in" page.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        initialize all components, set layout for this MainPanel. But only contains LoginPanel as a component.

      • buildGUI

        public void buildGUI()
        create GUI for MainPanel. It contains 2 sub panels: one is menu panel and other is the content panel.

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed()
        create actions for menu tabs: Subject, Teacher, Student, Log out tabs.
      • Click Subject tab -> the content panel is SubjectTab.
      • Click Teacher tab -> the content panel is UserTab with users are teachers.
      • Click Student tab -> the content panel is UserTab with users are students.
      • Click Log out tab -> the page change to LoginPanel.

  • restart

    private void restart()
    repaint MainPanel, change its content by removing all current components and change it back to LoginPanel as the beginning. Used for Log out action.

  • resetButton

    private void resetButton()
    reset foreground (text) of all buttons to black. Used when click a tab on the menu, this tab color changes to blue and others are black.

  • createMenu

    private void createMenu()
    create a menu panel which contains "Subject", "Teacher", "Student", "Log out" tabs and user name field.

  • setContentPanel

    public void setContentPanel(javax.swing.JPanel p)
    use to repaint the content panel.
    Parameters:
    p - is a panel

  • updateAccountName

    public void updateAccountName(java.lang.String acc)
    Use when change user using system.
    Use in LoginPanel.doLogin().
    Parameters:
    acc -

  • doLogout

    protected void doLogout(java.lang.String userkey)
    Send a logout request to server
  • btnLogout click
  • LoginPanel.doLogin() in case of a teacher or student try to login web app
    Parameters:
    userkey -
